entry.title: Tuesday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm except snowfall amount 4 cm over higher terrain. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:16 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
